# MroyaFtrack Unreal plugin â€” Python dependencies
#
# Target: Unreal Engine embedded Python 3.11 (default in UE 5.x).
# Install into this folder so the plugin can add it to sys.path:
#
#   python3.11 -m pip install -r requirements.txt -t .
#
# Or from repo root (path to this file):
#
#   python -m pip install -r Plugins/MroyaFtrack/dependencies/requirements.txt -t Plugins/MroyaFtrack/dependencies
#
# PySide6 is required for Qt UI; unreal-qt provides Unreal/PySide6 integration
# (parenting windows, event loop). unreal-qt pulls in unreal-stylesheet and
# importlib-metadata automatically.

PySide6>=6.5.0
unreal-qt>=0.0.3
